Package frogger.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HomeAnimation
    The HomeAnimation class creates a new Frog and keeps it jumping on the screen.
    ScoreboardReader
    The ScoreboardReader is a utility to read the scoreboard file of each level.
    ScoreboardWriter
    The ScoreboardWriter is a utility to write the player info to a scoreboard file.
    WorldLoader
    The WorldLoader is a utility to load the PreloadedActor according to the game mode and level.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MusicPlayer
    The MusicPlayer class is a utility to MusicPlayer.playMusic() or MusicPlayer.stopMusic().
    SceneSwitch
    The SceneSwitch class is a utility to switch different scenes (SceneSwitch.switchToHome(), SceneSwitch.switchToSelection() and SceneSwitch.switchToGame(GameMode, GameLevel, String, String)) in the primary stage or create a new stage (SceneSwitch.showHelp() and SceneSwitch.showScoreboard(String)).
    TouchChecker
    The TouchChecker is a utility to handle the touch event about the frog.
    TouchHandler
    The TouchHandler is a utility to handle the touch event about the frog.
